    Description
    AuthEvents
    event handler for authentication
    AuthFailureHandler
    listens to the login page to track status events
    CookieFixFilter
    middleware which clears cookies in the case of the app restarting and the user still being on the page
    EncodingConfig
    class that contains our password encoder as a bean so that it can be autowired
